event.title: measured 36 feet in circumference, was over 500 years

data.event: The tree measured 36 feet in circumference, was over 500 years old and, reportedly, featured branches over 70 feet long.
Edward Rowe was born in Bale in 1882.

event.title: gave his address as 56 Bridge Road, Southampton, signed-on to the Titanic’s new crew on 4 April 1912

data.event: After the ship arrived in Southampton, Edward Rowe, who gave his address as 56 Bridge Road, Southampton, signed-on to the Titanic’s new crew on 4 April 1912.
